argument.description: An expression that specifies the percentile.
Specifies the order of the rows from the same grouping set that are processed in the aggregation.
An expression that specifies the percentile.

description: The PERCENTILE_DISC function returns the value that corresponds to the specified percentile given a sort specification by using a discrete distribution model.
sample:
SELECT PERCENTILE_DISC(0.75) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SALARY) 
      INTO :PD FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE WORKDEPT = 'E21'
